author: Cricket

comment:
As much as it sucks that other actors are going to be affected by one single person's actions, their careers won't be tarnished or deeply affected if/when this movie flops.
In saying that, YES I want this movie to fail because Amber's actions are so much bigger and more damaging than the success or downfall of a movie.
What she did was serious and I don't believe she should be rewarded with movie roles for her bad behaviour.
Warner Bros punished an innocent man by taking away his job, and rewarded an abuser by giving her work. 
What kind of backwards, topsy turvy world is this, where the bad guy gets the  reward? No no no no, that's not how this works. 
So no, I will not EVER see the movie. In theatres or otherwise.
In the end, I believe we should all hit Warner Bros where it hurts and not support the movie at all. They will understand just how much we mean business when they lose money. 
And in the end, there will be #JusticeForJohnnyDepp

Sadly, I feel like the DCEU is a lost cause at this point.

author: E Cortes

comment:
Stay strong, girl. I have no doubt that you will get thru it. And brush your teeth ! And stop smoking, ffs. I love you to death, but sometimes you are killing me. üòò
I had a tooth pulled a few years back and it was not a pleasant experience. Ironically enough, 2 weeks ago i had first phase of tooth implant done. Expensive, but spending on own health is always a good investment.
Love the format btw. You ought to do it more. One nitpick, text cards on the sides, if you make them slanted, make them slanted on top and bottom, not left and right. It looks weird otherwise. Plus new photo, gorgeous as always. üòç

As far as JD goes, double standards of Hollyweird are well known, but eventually even they will gonna have to accept that AH are more trouble than she is worth. Sometimes battles are lost, sometimes they must be lost, but for as long as war is won it is an acceptable loss. And JD is winning this war.
Il probably will be seeing Aquaman 2...a Torrent Edition. No way im paying for it.
And again, take care  and get well. You are not alone.
